column4: hey, is there a way to attach a program to stdout of a process, if the sender process is already started and i only know the pid of it?
what do you mean by "attach"? pipe?
i just wrote a startup script and now i want the output of the program upstart started for me. just to check everything is fine
"the output of the program upstart started for me" - I don't understand. Is the program called "upstart"? How do you mean to start output?
